mapper.select:
SELECT SI.DEVICE_NO , SI.DEVICE_IMEI , SI.DEVICE_NUMBER , IFNULL(SI.NICK_NAME, "") AS NICK_NAME , SI.IS_ASSIGN , SI.LOC_CYCLE_1 , SI.LOC_CYCLE_2 , SI.LOC_CYCLE_3 , SI.REG_DATE , SI.EXP_DATE , SI.UPD_DATE FROM ST_DEVICE_INFO SI WHERE REG_DATE >= #{startDt} AND REG_DATE <= #{endDt} ORDER BY SI.REG_DATE
LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ST_DEVICE_INFO ( DEVICE_IMEI , DEVICE_NUMBER , IS_ASSIGN , LOC_CYCLE_1 , LOC_CYCLE_2 , LOC_CYCLE_3 , EXP_DATE , REG_DATE , UPD_DATE ) VALUES (#{deviceIMEI}, #{deviceNumber},#{isAssign}, #{locCycle1}, #{locCycle2}, #{locCycle3}, #{expDate} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'))
mapper.update: UPDATE ST_DEVICE_INFO SET DEVICE_IMEI = #{deviceIMEI}, DEVICE_NUMBER = #{deviceNumber}, IS_ASSIGN = #{isAssign}, LOC_CYCLE_1 = #{locCycle1}, LOC_CYCLE_2 = #{locCycle2}, LOC_CYCLE_3 = #{locCycle3}, EXP_DATE = #{expDate}, UPD_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') WHERE DEVICE_NO = #{deviceNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CODE_CD , CODE_NM , CODE_VALUE , GRUP_CD , CODE_SEQ FROM ST_CODE WHERE GRUP_CD = #{grupCd} ORDER BY CODE_SEQ;
